stimulusHtml: The customary destruction of Malagan display objects after their use has been interpreted as

features.html: The question refers to the two images shown.

choicesHtml: representing the ritual sacrifice of the objects as an offering to the gods
constituting the transfer of the objects into the realm of ancestral spirits
demonstrating that the objects have ceased to serve their spiritual function
symbolizing the destruction of negative forces that who might threaten the community
